text_logic_form: The length of the line $KP$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $PM$ is $7$ units.
Find the length of the line $JL$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $KP$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $PM$ is $7$ units.
Find the length of the line $JL$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $K$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $J$ and $L$.
The length of the line $JK$ is equal to the length of the line $ML$.
